title: Stripped Bear

And to the annoyance of the women on the block—including the local slut—she is the object of Reece’s and Blaine’s desires.Reece and Blaine have a secret. They are not quite human. The only thing left to do is convince Ayana that her new life isn’t complete until they are a permanent part of it.
